ing.item: Cocoa; (3/8 cup) Let me know how you measure 3/8 of a cup

directions.step:
This recipe is from the "Bach's Lunch" cookbook that I bought from Arlene when she collected some used cook books. For those of you who know me at all will not be surprised at the name of the cake because I fit right in there with it.
Sift first five ingredients into a 9" x 13" cake pan. Mix next three ingredients together and add to pan. Pour 2 cups water into pan and stir until well blended. Bake at 350 for 25 to 30 minutes.
To prepare frosting: combine chocolate, l/2 cup water, butter and 2-1/2 cups marshmallows. Stir over low heat until well blended. Cool slightly. Add sugar gradually and beat with wooden spoon until smooth. Add remaining marshmallows, nuts and vanilla. Frost cake right in the pan.
Recipe from Lou Ann Wait
Posted to TNT Recipes Digest by ellenmirvine@juno.com (Ellen M Irvine) on Feb 20, 1998
